ArchivedTerritoryName.description: The name of the associated territory that’s on an archived territory model. If the OpportunityLineItemSplit isn’t associated with a territory on an archived territory model, the field value is null. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for organizations with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

OpportunityLineItemId.description: Required. ID of the associated parent OpportunityLineItem. This field is a relationship field.

Split.description: Read-only. Automatically generated number identifying the split within the opportunity.

SplitAmount.description: The amount or value of the split.

SplitOwnerId.description: ID of the user who is the owner of the split. This field is a relationship field.

SplitPercentage.description: The percentage of the OpportunityLineItem's value that the split represents.

SplitTypeId.description: ID of the associated OpptyLineItemSplitType. This field is a relationship field.

Territory2Id.description: ID of the associated territory. This field is a relationship field, and is available in API version 62.0 and later.
